dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile Wallet is a system that allows users to pay and save funds for healthcare. The application aims to increase health spending and decrease out of pocket costs through risk pooling and digitizing healthcare payments.
Cees Hesp, Director Joint Learning, PharmAccess, Email: c.hesp@pharmaccess.org
Amsterdam Diner Foundation, Dutch Health Insurance Fund
The Mobile Health Research Lab: Mobile Wallet
Financial transactions and incentives, Primary care
